description:
At 5'1 and 95lbs Ashley looks so pure, so innocent, so cute. her musical little voice is magical, her skin so soft it invites invitation. Her eyes hypnotize, her smell intoxicates, she is temptation.
So lets fuck her up, shall we? Let's strip all the weapons that she has used her entire privileged life to get what ever she wants, and stick something in her ass. Let's ignore her charm and fuck her cunt hole with a huge dildo. Let's bring her to our world where her powers are useless, and she is confused as to why she can't control anything.
Let's make her cum until she is dizzy, double penetrate her, fill her whoreness up and watch her deal with a sexual attack she has no idea how to cope with. And lets call this wondrous day, this auspicious moment... Thursday!
title: Ashley Jane
